meta.description: On January 30, Fiona Hine joined us to speak about the success of the recent London rally outside the BBC in support of C19 vaccine victims.

title: Fiona Hine: CoviLeaks — Truth Be Told
cleaned_text:
Joining us live at General Assembly Meeting #74 on January 30, organizer Fiona Hine spoke about the success of the recent London rally outside the BBC in support of Covid-19 vaccine victims. She then answered questions from our live audience.

Fiona has spearheaded the #TruthBeTold Covid Vaccine Victim Awareness Month campaign in January 2023.
• Fiona Hine is the founder of CoviLeaks, an information hub which has organized countless Freedom Rallies in London since August 2020.
• As an Events, Hospitality and Business Development professional, Fiona suffered the loss of a career in 2020 due to the Covid lockdown. Having always been a critical thinker; she dedicated her time to research which led to the creation of CoviLeaks, organizing protests and being a Founding Member of The World Freedom Alliance.
• She now holds several criminal convictions for “holding a gathering of more than 6 or 30 people” due to organizing anti-lockdown rallies throughout 2020.
• Fiona led the #TruthBeTold COVID Vaccine Victim Awareness Month, a campaign to raise awareness about the damage, including life changing injuries and fatalities, as a direct result of the Covid-19 injections.
• In addition to being an information hub, CoviLeaks has organized Freedom Rallies in London since being founded by Fiona Hine in August 2020.
• They are a founding member of The World Freedom Alliance.
• They’re also a founding member of World Wide Rally For Freedom International and continue to organize Nationwide rallies, as well as support community outreach groups.

Find this video to watch and share on Rumble and Bitchute.

This is an edited segment from the weekly live General Assembly meeting on January 30, 2023. Antje Grosch and Shahin Afnan also presented at this meeting.
